name: Chitosan Post-Styling Hair Serum for Hold & Style Extending
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is: A lightweight post-styling serum that provides flexible, all-day hold for smooth, shiny, frizz-free hair. For use on dry and styled hair to hold and define style...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Hold & Style Extending.- Shine.- Frizz..Key Benefits: - Reduces frizz caused by humidity, for smoother hair that feels hydrated and conditioned after styling..- Creates immediate shine, definition, and lasting smoothness..- Delivers 2X longer hold.u00b9 Without the crunch...Highlighted Ingredients:- Chitosan: Locks in flexible hold..- Hyaluronic Acid: Reduces frizz..- Amino Acid Blend: Repairs signs of surface damage...*Dyson uses chitosan derived from oyster mushrooms, not shellfish in our styling range. Mushroom-derived chitosan offers a sustainable and non-allergenic solution for our active ingredient...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan...What Else You Need to Know: Formulated for all hair types, this lightweight serum provides flexible hold with immediate definition and humidity protection. It conditions hair while locking in its shape with a flexible bond structure that wonu2019t alter your hairu2019s natural texture. Chitosan, an ingredient derived from oyster mushrooms, allows each strand to move, flex, and recall its style in unison with the rest. Each bottle contains the equivalent of four to five oyster mushroomsu2019 worth of chitosan...Caveats:.u00b9vs. untreated hair..*Dyson uses chitosan derived from oyster mushrooms, not shellfish in our styling range. Mushroom-derived chitosan offers a sustainable and non-allergenic solution for our active ingredient...Fragrance Description: A unique and subtle blend of green and floral notes, Dysonu2019s signature fragrance unfolds with bergamot, basil, and tangerine.
ingredients: -Chitosan: Locks in flexible hold..-Hyaluronic Acid: Reduces frizz..-Amino Acid Blend: Repairs signs of surface damage...Aqua (Water/Eau), Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-6 Stearate, Glycerin, Phyllostachys Bambusoides Extract, Chitosan, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Panthenol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Caesalpinia Spinosa Gum, Sclerotium Gum, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium PCA, Arginine, PCA, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-6 Behenate, Lactic Acid, Sodium Lactate, Tocopherol, Aspartic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Parfum ( Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Limonene, Citronellol, Citral.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use on dry hair, after styling with your favorite Dyson hair tool (sold separately)..-Pump to dispense product. .-For fine hair, start with one to two pumps. For thick hair, start with three to five pumps. Add more as needed..-Sheer between palms..-Smooth onto mid-lengths and ends..-For best results, use with the Chitosan Pre-Styling Hair Cream for Flexible Hold (sold separately) for maximum retention...Recycling Instructions:.-Inner cartridge and refill cartridge are recyclable. Remove pump and/or cap and ensure container is fully clean before recycling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Did not hold any of my hairstyles at all. For its price and the fact that it holds Dysonu2019s name and technology

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For $60, I expected more from this product. I couldnu2019t really tell any difference with or without using the product. It didnu2019t make my curls/waves last longer, didnu2019t do much to reduce frizz.. I ended up returning it. Interesting how all the good reviews are incentivizedu2026.

reviews.review_title: Expensive and yet not so great
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I thought it's great because of the brand , but hair still frizzy once exposed to humid . Need a lot of it to control the frizziness . I probably go back using Olaplex oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: nice hair serum. hair stays shiny and smooth. My hair looks good all day. the smell is delicate but very nice. the packaging is interesting and easy to use. I recommend trying this product out because it really works. Offered by dysonhair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG, this Dyson Chitosan Hair Serum is a total game-changer!ud83cudf38 I have super sensitive hair that frizzes the second I step outside, but after using this serum, itu2019s like my strands have a magical shield! u2728 Itu2019s so lightweight but gives such a glossy, frizz-free finish. I love that it's powered by chitosanu2014so natural and gentle. The serum doesnu2019t feel greasy at all, and my hair stays soft and touchable. Itu2019s been perfect after styling! ud83dudc95 And the scent? So fresh and clean. I feel like Iu2019ve just walked out of a salon every time I use it. Iu2019m totally obsessed! If you want hair thatu2019s shiny, smooth, and healthy-looking, youu2019ve got to try this. Your hair will thank you! ud83dude0d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After diffusing with the straight/wavy rich styler I have a little bit of frizz, but this completely calms it down. It gave my hair a similar look to a glossing oil without weighing down my natural waves. I'm so impressed. I absolutely adore the way this smells and how it makes my hair feel. I wanted to hate it, but I just can't. The scent and the packing really take this product over the top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this post style serum. Made my hair the perfect soft finish that it needed after styling it. Highly recommend if you are looking for you next perfect hair product that not only holds the style of your hair but also gives a smooth look!

reviews.review_title: A holy grail hair product! Worth it!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am completely obsessed with this serum! From the packaging to the smell and the way it leaves my hair! The hold, the shine, how smooth my hair is! Iu2019m Obsessed! I was worried it wasnu2019t going to work for my fine hair but it does! Itu2019s like I just left the salon every time I use it! Definitely purchasing a backup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: have loved my dyson super sonic for years! Then i saw dyson came out with hair products and had to try. This post styling serum is amazing! Very lightweight but holds your style, not sticky and creates incredible shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for 2 weeks and gave it an honest effort before writing this review. And this is the very first review I have written though being a Beauty Insider for many years. Sadly I had to return this product and the accompanying serum. I have fine hair and these products made my hair dry and frizzy. I used both together per the instructions then separately and had to return for the price point. I will stick with Virtue products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a huge fan of Dyson products and had to try this serum! I just love the innovative the packaging! It dispenses the perfect amount without any mess! The serum itself makes my hair feel soft, shiny, frizz free and smells amazing! The perfect accompaniment to my AirWrap and so happy to add this to my haircare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This styling cream is so good and absolutely love using this! Very easy to use and the bottle is perfect and easy to use.I feel like it helps my hair look skinny and hold the curl longer. Love this styling cream and can't recommend more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the Dyson Post Style Serum for a few weeks now, and Iu2019m incredibly impressed with the results. This serum is a game-changer for taming frizz and adding a beautiful, sleek finish to my hair after styling. Itu2019s lightweight and doesnu2019t leave any greasy residue, which is a huge plus for someone like me with fine hair. My hair feels smoother, looks shinier, and stays styled longer, even in humid conditions. The serum also has a subtle, pleasant scent that isnu2019t overpowering. Overall, itu2019s a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their hair care routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum definitely met the Dyson standard! I have to start with the packaging! The design is sleek and has a magnetic closure top and the dispenser distributes the perfect amount. The serum is very lightweight and the texture is very silky. It gives a healthy finish and tames flyaway hairs without disturbing your hairstyle. The scent is very light and fresh and gives the signature salon fragrance. As a professional stylist, I can confidently say that this serum is very high quality! Everything from the ingredients to the packaging! Yes!! Itu2019s worth it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The post style serum gives you a small amount so itu2019s nice the pump does it otherwise i definitely would have gone overboard. itu2019s a little sticky in my hands after running through and seems to dry quite fast but it doesnu2019t leave my hair with that typical crunch a lot of products do. itu2019s not the highest hold serum but itu2019s medium hold and doesnu2019t leave my hair crunchy. i believe that would signify itu2019s probably healthier for hair than others. After work and yoga my hair was not super frizzy and itu2019s still quite soft. Iu2019d be curious to see how it would hold up on curled hair because i only used it on post blow dry/blow out straightened hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Dyson Chitosan for few days now! I must say how amazing this product is! I love how it helped with my curls staying all day! I used 2 pumps of my long hair after using my dyson airwrap and the curls lasted all day! Iu2019m obsessed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the lightweight formula and the long-lasting hold. It works amazing defending my hair against humidity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It feels light and not greasy at all. It keeps my hair in style and helps a lot with the frizz in my hair. I love how innovative the product is and how you can get more information.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of, love the smell. I can go on and on in smelling the scent. After styling, I put 3 pumps of product in my hair and it instantly gave me a soft and smooth finish. My hair was shining throughout and I loved it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all I love the packaging! Super unique and fun! This serum smells AMAZING!!! Itu2019s like a pretty/girly/clean smell! The actual serum itself feels very nice, and makes my hair look and feel great! It doesnu2019t make your hair sticky at all, but I can definitely tell it will help hold the style!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this. But the ingredients list has so much that I avoid. Dimethicone is 2nd on the list!!! Definitely not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this new hair Serum offered by dysonhair , and Iu2019m absolutely in love with it! Itu2019s super lightweight and gives my hair a flexible hold that lasts all day. I just smooth it through my hair, and it instantly adds shine and definition without weighing my hair down. Itu2019s amazing at reducing frizz, even in humid weather, and keeps my hair looking smooth and polished. My hair feels hydrated and looks so much healthier after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum. It works so well especially paired with my Dyson. I definitely recommend if you want to have the perfect blow out or style. I have thinner hair for reference. I definitely love it!!! Gifted by Dyson

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by dysonhair. I have hair that has been previously bleached and can feel rather dry/damaged but itu2019s also weighed down very easily. I have been using this after styling serum for a few weeks now and really like it!! It is extremely lightweight but provided some much needed moisture and shine to my hair after blow drying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Dyson! It has been a life saver for my frizzy curly hair. I have been using it for weeks and I have noticed such a huge difference in my hair and how completely soft it makes my hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Dyson and was not sure if i would like a product by Dyson as they usually make electronics. I ended up really liking the product. It was lightweight on my hair but stilll gave enough hold to fight any frizzyness. I also liked how it dispensed the perfect amount of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s so hard to find a styling product that doesnu2019t leave my hair feeling crispy or is actually long-lasting..until now! I have always been a fan of Dyson (their hair tools are my favorite!) so Iu2019m so happy they started making haircare products! This holds my curls or keeps my hair flat and straight without any frizz all day long. Easy to use and great on my hair! Gifted by Dyson Hair but thoughts are my own!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so excited Dyson finally released hair care that goes perfectly with all their hair styling products The post styling specifically itu2019s PERFECT to make the Dyson curls last longer and look better Gifted by Dyson

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is great! It has a magnetic cap and is easy to dispense the serum into your hands. It also smells amazing which is a bonus! I have naturally wavy hair, and this helps to control the frizz. Complimentary from Dyson Hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving this hair serum gifted by Dyson! My hair is very fine but this serum is super light weight. It adds shine and makes my hair feel incredibly soft without weighing it down. It is the perfect addition to my hair care routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine, longer than shoulder-length wavy hair that I usually air-dry and straighten, or lightly blow-dry for a natural wavy style. I was impressed with the smooth, hydrated result this gave my hair. It keeps my ends looking healthier, as they tend to look dry from all the heat styling. My fine hair is also prone to a lot of frizz, and I do feel that this helps to manage that a bit. Iu2019m excited about the formula and will keep using this to finish styling my hair! Gifted by Dyson.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dyson Chitosan Pre-Styling Hair Cream is a game-changer! I have wavy hair that tends to frizz, and this lightweight cream gives me long-lasting hold without the crunchy feel. The smooth texture transforms to a serum, making it easy to apply evenly. My hair feels soft and touchable with a natural shine, and the subtle fragrance is a nice bonus. I love how it locks in my style for hours and cuts frizz by half. A few pumps are all I need before blow-drying for salon-quality results at home. Truly, itu2019s a must for flexible, natural hold! Gifted by dysonhair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dyson chitosan post styling hair serum is an amazing addition to my hairstyling routine. This is luxury in a bottle. First of all this serum smells amazing. Next what a great packaging. You just press this on your hand and the serum comes out. I use three pumps for my long hair before straightening. I also go ahead with two pumps after straightening with flat iron. I am amazed at the results . This was gifted by Dysonhair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A lightweight fast absorbing serum that helps keep your hair touchable and soft while also holding your style and shape firm for the day! Really love using this on my waves and curls instead of using a spray to help hold my look! Offered by Dyson

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly had no idea what to expect from this hair serum and I ended up being so pleasantly surprised! My hair is very fine, straight, and processed. Therefore, I need product to keep my hair looking smooth and not frizzy, but it needs to be light enough so that my hair does not get weighed down. This serum, applied after drying my hair, keeps my hair looking smooth and shiny and free of frizz, and is super lightweight. Iu2019m not really using it for hold necessarily, but I do find that my hair maintains a smooth appearance for the duration of the day after Iu2019ve applied it. Iu2019m pretty impressed! The packaging is really smart, too. I recommend this! Gifted by Dyson.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dyson Jair gifted me this product. I fell in love with the packaging as soon as I took it out of the box. The packaging is so different and easy to use. I tried it in several ways. I used it on dry hair, perfect for smoothing frizz, and I used it on wet hair before drying my hair, and I noticed that it gives my hair an incredible shine. I'm loving the results I've gotten on my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this styling cream from Dyson. This is an amazing company. I love their products. This is an amazing new product. I love putting it on my hair. It has great packaging. If you want a new product get this.

reviews.review_title: Tames my  frizz in humid climate !!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OK, first off the innovative packaging. Itu2019s super modern and honestly  really fun to use. Anyways the product itself made my hair very silky smooth. I felt like my fizz was tamed a lot. I currently live in a very humid area and I had minimal frizz and had great shine and bounced to my hair. Gifted by dysonhair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great product! Keeps my hair in place, keeps the frizz away and nourishes too! The perfect combo. This hydrates my hair and keeps the style I walked out the door with. Recommend! Gifted by Dyson

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Dyson in exchange for my honest review. This chitosan post styling serum gives my styled curls just a bit more bounce, and holds the curls better. Has a nice scent too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for the first time today at 10am after I curled my hair and by the time 9pm came I had curls that had completely fallen and gone straight. I have never had that happen, it has to be the serum. I have slept in curls and 2 days later the curls still in tact so the only thing I could think of was it had to be the serum. Maybe itu2019s too heavy for my hair? I will try again with straight hair because I did love how soft and shiny it made my hair  Offered by Dysonhair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is the ultimate multitasker! I donu2019t always heat style my hair so I have been using this on my air dried hair as well, to help tame frizzies and humidity. It works like a dream.  I have thick long hair and 2 pumps is enough, so a little really does go a long way. I love the dispenser because it gives an equal amount of product every time and literally 2 drops leaves my hair smoother and looking more put together. Thereu2019s no oiliness or stiffness, just brushable and effortlessly easy style.

reviews.review_title: Works so well with my hair!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this hair serum from Dyson. I absolutely love this brand and have several of their products, and now they have hair care products which is awesome. First off, the packaging of this serum is amazing, and honestly what I would expect the design to be like from Dyson. And I love the way you dispense the hair serum and how the tube of product can be taken out, so cool. The texture is light and creamy,  and easy to run through my hair. It smells super good,  has floral and woodsy notes, and the bergamot really comes through. It makes my hair smell incredible all day long. My hair feel very smooth and soft after I apply it, and gives it a beautiful shine. It makes my curls more defined, bouncy, and luscious. The serum has helped tremendously with reducing my frizz and flyaways, and just giving my hair an overall healthier feel and look. I'm loving this hair serum and use it often. Will definitely buy it again. I received this product complimentary from Dyson.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Dyson. I'm so excited about this hair serum! The container is a heavy duty size and really packs a punch for knocking down frizz! I use a little from the ends and slowly work my way up. It gives a nice sheen to my hair while keeping it contained and less wind blown. I can't wait to use this all summer and winter long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product made me speechless after using. I have naturally wavy and frizzy hair, and when I style it, it always still feels dry and messy. After using this serum, I saw a noticeable difference in the shine and definition of my curls. Bonus: it smells amazing! Gifted by Dyson.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Dyson Chitosan Post Style Serum transforms my fine, frizzed out hair in moments! Iu2019m truly elated by the exceptional results!  This lightweight serum instantly calms, smooths and shines, while keeping my style in place. Fly aways are tamed. Impressive ingredients where I notice an improved difference in texture and softness. The innovative precision applicator, dispenses the perfect amount every time.  The design is not only modern and beautiful, but refillable. Walk out of the salon results....Iu2019m really excited about this fabulous Dyson Serum!

reviews.review_title: A must have my hair loves it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dyson never disappoints, Iu2019m not a huge fan of hair sprays because I feel like it makes my hair hard and not very manageable, but this product not only holds my hairstyle in place it makes it so manageable and bouncy, I love how I been styling my hair lately all thanks to this, it is definitely worth it 10/10 gifted by Dysonhair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hair serum so much! I would personally consider it texturally as a serum/cream. Itu2019s light weight and not sticky at all. I apply it to the ends and shafts of my hair after styling with my dyson air wrap and it adds a lovely shine and softness to my hair. It does a good job of locking in my style and keeping my hair looking fresh all day. This serum was offered by Dysonhair in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This a gorgeous new product and so excited to see Dyson expanding! This is an amazing product for hold to my hair, I find that if I put it in after it is fully dry and then style my hair, it looks so smooth and it really does hold so well. Gifted by Dyson

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Dyson's Chitosan Post-Styling Hair Serum, and it's amazing! This lightweight serum gives my hair a beautiful shine and flexible hold without weighing it down. It works wonders on frizz, especially in humid weather, and keeps my hair looking smooth and polished all day. Just a few pumps make a noticeable difference. If you're looking for a product that enhances your style while keeping your hair healthy, I highly recommend it! Gifted by Dyson

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product gifted by Dyson hair. I am impressed! It gives you shine and makes your hair silky smooth. I use it before and after styling. I have loved all of Dyson products and this one did not disappoint!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shine this gives my hair is unreal. Itu2019s meant to be used on dry, already styled hair. While I typically wear my hair straight, it tends to get very frizzy especially in this hot humid weather. This does a great job as smoothing the frizz and keeping it away. On the odd chance that I wear my hair curled, this serum helps to define and hold. My curls last longer and look better than they normally would. One or two pumps is enough for my shoulder length hair. Love the pump dispenser as well. Thereu2019s even a NFC tag on the bottle to learn more about the product. Gifted by Dyson.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Dysonhair. This product has the sleekest, most modern packaging. It has a pump that distributes the recommended amount of product. You can use one to two pumps. I love this as I tend to overuse products. The smell is so nice, it is a gentle and not overpowering smell. The product spreads evenly and isn't greasy. After blow drying it left my hair so soft and frizz free. It smelled nice all day and my style lasted!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by dysonhair This stuff works surprisingly well! I tested it out by putting some on my dry hair on my ends and up toward my mid section , focusing on areas with fly-aways. Really love it leaves my hair with no frizz and my hair was loooking shine all day long

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was lucky to be gifted by dysonhair. I love the pump and packaging. The product is also great! I use it in my hair after curling it and it makes it so smooth and sleek. I have straight hair but it does not feel heavy so I don't have to worry about it weighing my curls down!

reviews.review_title: My hair feels healthy and happy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this post styling hair cream. This lightweight cream not only holds the style after heat styling but also hydrated hair. My hair looked so healthy after applying just a single pump of this serum/ cream. The best thing about this cream is that it does not weigh down hair. Gifted by Dyson hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dyson post styling serum is now my go to! Itu2019s my first Dyson product and itu2019s amazing . My hair is softer , silkier , less breakage and the best itu2019s ever been. I canu2019t wait to try other products frm the line Gifted by Dyson

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by dysonhair. I have wavy hair which prone to frizz and this serum is life-saver for me. It has hyaluronic acid which moisturizes the hair and keeps the hair smooth. The packaging is very interesting and innovative which is not new for dyson. The price is a bit discouraging though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair serum is incredible! It smooths frizz, adds shine, and makes styling effortless. My hair feels healthier and looks stunning all day long. It's a must-have for anyone wanting sleek, manageable hair without the hassle. Highly recommend! *gifted by Dyson

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Dyson. I was very excited to try this product and it definitely does not disappoint! I use it after styling my hair. It only takes a small amount and smells really nice. It leaves my hair shiny and helps reduce my frizz. I love the beautiful unique packaging as well.

reviews.review_text: I was lucky to be gifted by dysonhair. I love the pump and packaging. The product is also great! I use it in my hair after curling it and it makes it so smooth and sleek. I have straight hair but it does not feel heavy so I don't have to worry about it weighing my curls down!

reviews.review_title: My hair feels healthy and happy

reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this post styling hair cream. This lightweight cream not only holds the style after heat styling but also hydrated hair. My hair looked so healthy after applying just a single pump of this serum/ cream. The best thing about this cream is that it does not weigh down hair. Gifted by Dyson hair
